dcterms:creator: Y. Zheng
L. Liu
L. Wang
X. Xie
dcterms:description: The dataset comprises both labeled and unlabeled data, collected from a total of 182 users, including 69 users with labeled data and 113 users with unlabeled data. For five years, the users record their traffic mode data in the form of Global Positioning System (GPS) points and timestamps, along with the corresponding traffic mode, which encompasses activities such as walking, biking, and bus transit.
dcterms:title: Microsoft’s Geolife dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Zheng
Q. Li
Y. Chen
X. Xie
W.-Y. Ma
dcterms:description: The dataset is utilized for understanding mobility based on GPS data, providing insights into user movement patterns and habits.
dcterms:title: Microsoft’s Geolife dataset
